subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Arizona sent Justin Upton to Atlanta, where he will join his brother B. J., in a seven-player deal that sent infielder Martin Prado to the Diamondbacks.
snippet: Arizona sent Justin Upton to Atlanta, where he will join his brother B. J., in a seven-player deal that sent infielder Martin Prado to the Diamondbacks.
